overview: A dark comedy short film that takes place in an English pub and follows the story of two best friends, Lily and Jean. When Jean proposes that Lily be her maid of honour, Lily is initially excited, but the situation takes a dark turn when Jean asks for her help in a sinister plan. The short film explores themes of loyalty, trust, and the lengths people will go to for friendship.
tagline: TIL DEATH DO US PART... OR SO SHE THINKS
title: Maid of Honour
